import axios from 'axios' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { WeatherObjectCon } from './WeatherObjectCon' const WEATHER_API_KEY = 'f31dc2b8b49a27efda7c2d44d41aa637' const Forcast = () => { const [location, setlocation] = useState('') const handleSearch = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { const response = await axios.get('https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/forecast', { params: { q: location, APPID: WEATHER_API_KEY, }, }); if (response.data) { const weatherObject = WeatherObjectCon(response.data.name, response.data.main.temp, response.data.main.pressure, response.data.main.humidity, response.data.wind.speed, response.data.clouds.all) } } catch (error) { console.error(error); // Handle errors } } const GetForcastRow = () => { return ( Apple MacBook Pro 17" Silver Laptop $2999 ) } return (
{ setlocation(e.target.value) }} />
{ setlocation(e.target.value) }} />
Time Temperature Cloudy Wind Humaidity Pressure
) } export default Forcast
